    • Measuring distances from the frontier
  • Changelog

    Prediction the Regression Discontinuity

    predict.rd.Rd

    predict.rd makes predictions of mean and standard deviation of RDs at different cutoffs.

    # S3 method for rd
predict(object, gran = 50, ...)

    Arguments

    object

    An rd object, typically the result of rd_est.

    gran

    Granularity of the data points i.e. desired number of predicted points.

    ...

    Additional arguments affecting the predictions produced.

    Examples

    x <- runif(1000, -1, 1)
cov <- rnorm(1000)
y <- 3 + 2 * x + 3 * cov + 10 * (x >= 0) + rnorm(1000)
tr <- as.integer(x >= 0)
rd <- rd_est(y ~ x + tr | cov, cutpoint = 0, t.design = "geq") 
predict(rd)
